sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Modal, Header, Icon,Form,Image, Button, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react';

class CreatePostModal extends React.Component{

    

    render(){

        
        const {user,modal,closeModal} = this.props;
        return(
            <Modal centered size='small' open={modal} onClose={closeModal} closeIcon style={{top: '10%', transform: 'translateY(-10%)'}}>
                <Modal.Header >
                    <Header as='h3'><Icon name='write'/>Tạo Bài Viết</Header>
                </Modal.Header>
                <Modal.Content>
                    <Form style={{marginTop: '5px'}}>
                        <Form.Group >
                            <Image inline size='tiny' avatar src={user.photoURL}/>


                            <Form.Field style={{width: '100%'}}>
                                <Input placeholder="Bạn đang nghĩ gì ?" transparent style={{height: '100%',fontSize: 16}} />

                            </Form.Field>

                        </Form.Group>
                        
                        <Button.Group>
                            <Button   circular  >
                            <svg width="25" height="25" viewBox="0 0 25 25" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M1 1V17H17V1H1Z" fill="#59FFEB" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.24"/>
<circle cx="4.2" cy="4.20001" r="1.6" fill="#FFE974"/>
<path d="M9 10.6L1 17H15.4L9 10.6Z" fill="#07FF3E" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.1"/>
<path d="M15.4 9L10.6 12.2L15.4 17H17V10.6L15.4 9Z" fill="#07FF3E" stroke="black" stroke-width="0.1"/>
</svg>






                            </Button>
                        </Button.Group>


                        <Form.Button  color='black' fluid style={{background: '#64cd82',marginTop: '50px'}}>Chia sẻ</Form.Button>

                    </Form>
                </Modal.Content>
            </Modal>
        );
    }
}

export default CreatePostModal
